text: Jilani: “Ana nduni jwaakumpaga lisiki kuumila kwinani ni pasi? Kapena nduni jwakamulile kupikana ni kulola? Soni nduni jwaakukoposyaga chawumi kuumila mu chachiwe nikoposya chachiwe kuumila mu chawumi? Soni nduni jwaakulondesyaga indu yosope?” Tajile: “Allah.” Basi jilani: “Nambi uli jenumanja ngan’jogopa (Jwalakwe)?”
